title: Rubber XLR Cover Boot
blurb: While it won't make your audio connections totally waterproof, it will mean you can effectively operate a PA or sound system outdoors in inclement weather without undue damage. This flexible boot slips over the entire XLR - XLR connection to keep water and dust out. Even if you aren't planning to use your system in the rain, they're still indispensable for protecting permanent connections from damage and dust.
